word: How to Wear the Yoke.--Take hold of the arm of God, and say, "I am nothing, and Thou art everything. Thou hast said, 'Without me ye can do nothing.' Now, Lord, I must have Thee abiding in me, that I may abide in Thee." Then advance step by step, by living faith abiding in Jesus Christ. This is wearing His yoke, the yoke of obedience (MS 85, 1901).
